model

Class DVDCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MoviesCollection
      • model.DVDCollection

  • public class DVDCollection
extends MoviesCollection
    DVDCollection extends MoviesCollection and outlines basic variables needed for a DVDCollection. Title: The title of this DVD. Year: The year this DVD was released. Genre: The genre of this DVD. Format: The specified format of this movie collectible (DVD). Director: The director of this DVD. Special Edition: Whether this DVD was part of a special edition (Anniversary edition, Unrated, etc) Case Type: The case type of this DVD (cardboard, plastic, jewel case, etc). Special Featuring: Whether this DVD includes special features. Criterion: Whether this DVD was part of a criterion collection (printing and pressing of historical movies). Spine Number: If the DVD is part of a criterion, then it will include a spine number.
    Author:
    Jesus Nieto, Travis Lawson
